test-case.name: override-f-001
test-case.description: Successful override of a function

test-case.name: override-f-002
test-case.description: Successful use of override of a function defined in a library package

test-case.name: override-f-003
test-case.description: Unsuccessful use of override of a function defined in a library package. Parameter types are different

test-case.name: override-f-004
test-case.description: Unsuccessful use of override of a function as it is not defined in a library package.

test-case.name: override-f-005
test-case.description: Disallow text as a child of xsl:override.

test-case.name: override-f-006
test-case.description: Disallow LRE as a child of xsl:override.

test-case.name: override-f-007
test-case.description: Disallow xsl:override as a child of xsl:override.

test-case.name: override-f-008
test-case.description: Empty xsl:override is allowed.

test-case.name: override-f-009
test-case.description: Overridden function called from within a stylesheet function

test-case.description: Overridden function called from within a global variable initializer

test-case.description: Overridden function called from within a template rule

test-case.name: override-f-012
test-case.description: Overridden function called from within a global variable in used package

test-case.name: override-f-013
test-case.description: Overridden function called via function reference in used package

test-case.name: override-f-014
test-case.description: Private function called via function reference in used package

test-case.name: override-f-015
test-case.description: Partial function application of an overridden function

test-case.name: override-f-016
test-case.description: A function call using xsl:original

test-case.name: override-f-017
test-case.description: A named function reference using xsl:original

test-case.name: override-f-018
test-case.description: Partial function application using xsl:original

test-case.name: override-f-019
test-case.description: Two conflicting overrides of the same function

test-case.name: override-f-020
test-case.description: Override conflicts with locally-declared function

test-case.name: override-f-021
test-case.description: Unsuccessful use of override of a function defined in a library package. Determinism is different

test-case.name: override-f-022
test-case.description: Unsuccessful attempt to override a function outside xsl:override

test-case.name: override-f-023
test-case.description: Unsuccessful attempt to override a function outside xsl:override

test-case.name: override-f-024
test-case.description: Override a function called indirectly (from XML London workshop)

test-case.name: override-f-025
test-case.description: Override a function that doesn't exist

test-case.name: override-f-026
test-case.description: Override an abstract function

test-case.name: override-f-027
test-case.description: Override a function, argument and result types are implicit

test-case.name: override-f-028
test-case.description: Top level can use xsl:stylesheet rather than xsl:package

test-case.name: override-f-029
test-case.description: xsl:use=package can be reached via xsl:include

test-case.name: override-f-030
test-case.description: xsl:use-package cannot be reached via xsl:import

test-case.name: override-f-031
test-case.description: Compatibility rules for union types

test-case.name: override-f-032
test-case.description: Overriding named function called from an inline function

test-case.name: override-f-033
test-case.description: Call an overridden functions from an overridden function

test-case.name: override-f-034
test-case.description: Overriding function has different properties from overridden: try to confuse the optimizer. See Saxon bug 3762.

test-case.name: override-t-001
test-case.description: Successful override of a named template, when called from overriding package

test-case.name: override-t-002
test-case.description: Successful override of a named template, when called from base package

test-case.name: override-t-003
test-case.description: Cannot call an abstract template

test-case.name: override-t-004
test-case.description: Illegal template override, parameter types do not match

test-case.name: override-t-005
test-case.description: Illegal template override, context item types do not match

test-case.name: override-t-006
test-case.description: Illegal template override, context item use does not match

test-case.name: override-t-007
test-case.description: A named template calling xsl:original

test-case.name: override-t-008
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a named template, declared outside xsl:override

test-case.name: override-t-009
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a named template, declared outside xsl:override

test-case.name: override-t-010
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a named template, the implicit visibility of the template is private

test-case.name: override-t-011
test-case.description: Successful override of a named template, override has an extra tunnel parameter (bug 29981)

test-case.name: override-t-012
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a named template, override declares a tunnel parameter with the wrong type

test-case.name: override-t-013
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a named template, override declares a tunnel parameter overriding a non-tunnel-parameter

test-case.name: override-t-014
test-case.description: Two different overrides of selected components in the same library package

test-case.name: override-t-015
test-case.description: Two different overrides of selected components in different versions of the same library package

test-case.name: override-v-001
test-case.description: Successful override of a public global variable

test-case.name: override-v-002
test-case.description: Reference from private variable to overridden public variable

test-case.description: An overridden public global variable using xsl:original

test-case.description: An overridden public global variable appearing in a match pattern

test-case.description: An overridden variable using a different union type with the same member types

test-case.name: override-v-006
test-case.description: An overridden variable using a different union type with different member types

test-case.name: override-v-007
test-case.description: An overridden variable using a different built-in type

test-case.name: override-v-008
test-case.description: Overriding a variable with a required parameter

test-case.name: override-v-009
test-case.description: Overriding a variable with an optional parameter

test-case.name: override-v-010
test-case.description: Overriding a required parameter with an optional parameter. (But see bug 29242)

test-case.name: override-v-011
test-case.description: Overriding variable appearing outside xsl:override

test-case.name: override-v-012
test-case.description: Overriding variable appearing outside xsl:override

test-case.name: override-v-013
test-case.description: Overriding variable used in an inline function

test-case.name: override-v-014
test-case.description: Overriding variable used in an inline function that has a closure

test-case.name: override-v-015
test-case.description: Overriding a param, calling in a non-default mode. Saxon issue 3338.

test-case.name: override-as-001
test-case.description: Successful override of a public attribute-set

test-case.name: override-as-002
test-case.description: Successful override of a public attribute-set with use-attribute-sets="xsl:original"

result.assert-xml: <out><x base1="base1" priv1="priv1" pub1="pub1o" pub2="pub2" pub3="pub3o"/><y abs1="abs1o" abs2="abs2o"/><z final1="final1"/></out>

test-case.name: override-as-003
test-case.description: Override of a public attribute-set creates a circularity

test-case.name: override-as-004
test-case.description: Attempt to override a private attribute-set

test-case.name: override-as-005
test-case.description: Two private attribute sets with the same name in different packages

result.assert-xml: <out><x base1="base1" priv1="priv1" pub1="pub1" pub2="pub2"/><y priv8="priv8" priv9="priv9"/></out>

test-case.name: override-m-001
test-case.description: Successful override of a template rule in a public mode

test-case.name: override-m-002
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a template rule in a final mode

test-case.name: override-m-003
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a template rule in a private mode

test-case.name: override-m-004
test-case.description: Unsuccessful override of a template rule in the unnamed mode

test-case.name: override-m-005
test-case.description: Within override, template referring to its own mode

test-case.name: override-m-006
test-case.description: Within override, template using next-match

test-case.name: override-m-007
test-case.description: Within override, template using next-match indirectly

test-case.name: override-m-008
test-case.description: Within override, two matching templates; last one wins

test-case.name: override-m-009
test-case.description: Within override, two matching templates; explicit priority

test-case.name: override-m-010
test-case.description: Within override, default-mode attribute

test-case.name: override-m-011
test-case.description: Within override, overriding template has a match pattern and a name but the name is unknown

test-case.name: override-m-012
test-case.description: Within override, overriding template has a match pattern and a name; it overrides both

test-case.name: override-m-013
test-case.description: Within override, cannot override the xsl:mode declaration itself

test-case.name: override-m-014
test-case.description: Within override, override a template in two modes at once

test-case.name: override-m-015
test-case.description: Within override, two overriding templates passing each other tunnel parameters

test-case.name: override-m-016
test-case.description: Within override, cannot override a template rule in a mode accepted as final

test-case.name: override-m-017
test-case.description: Unsuccessful attempt to redeclare a mode defined in a used package

test-case.name: override-m-018
test-case.description: Unsuccessful attempt to add a template rule to a mode from a used package outwith xsl:override

test-case.name: override-m-019
test-case.description: Two overriding templates passing each other tunnel parameters, in separate xsl:override elements

test-case.name: override-m-020
test-case.description: Use a public mode in a used package without overriding any template rules

test-case.name: override-m-021
test-case.description: Use a public mode in a used package without overriding any template rules

test-case.name: override-misc-001
test-case.description: Cannot override a key

test-case.name: override-misc-002
test-case.description: Cannot override an accumulator

test-case.name: override-misc-003
test-case.description: Cannot override a decimal format

test-case.name: override-misc-004
test-case.description: Keys in different packages can have the same name

test-case.name: override-misc-005
test-case.description: Accumulators in different packages can have the same name

test-case.name: override-misc-006
test-case.description: Decimal formats in different packages can have the same name

test-case.name: override-misc-007
test-case.description: Streamed accumulators in different packages can have the same name
